content:
FILE_WRITTEN:outputs/CLAIM_CARD_TEMPLATE.md
DIR_STATE:["outputs/CASE_STUDY_RUBRIC.md", "outputs/CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE.md", "outputs/CLAIM_CARD_TEMPLATE.md", "outputs/METADATA_SCHEMA.json", "outputs/PROJECT_TRACKER.csv", "outputs/PROJECT_TRACKER.json", "outputs/README.md", "outputs/REPORT_OUTLINE.md", "outputs/RIGHTS_AND_LICENSING_CHECKLIST.md", "outputs/RIGHTS_LOG.csv"]
SUMMARY: Updated the claim card template to require verbatim claim text, full context (speaker/date/link), a precise provenance anchor, and explicit validation/abstention rules when any required field is missing.
